row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PRV.JOB.GET_ARTIFACT.VERIFY_CHECKSUM@GENERIC
row.description: Verify checksum of files in artifact folder

row.process:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Folder" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VERIFY_TARGET_DIR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Checksum option" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VERIFY_CHECKSUM_OPTION#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Excludes" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VERIFY_EXCLUDES#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Building output file path
! Action name : SET &UC4RB_ACTION_NAME# = "VerifyAction"
! Define java options and values : DEFINE &UC4RB_OPTIONS#, string, 8
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[3] = "-folder" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_VERIFY_TARGET_DIR#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[5] = "-checksum" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_VERIFY_CHECKSUM_OPTION#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[7] = "-excludes" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_VERIFY_EXCLUDES#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_ARTIFACT.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** VERIFY ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** VERIFY ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process:
:SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*----->*') :PRINT "Update Artifact VARA:" :PROCESS &HND# : SET &FILE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 1) : SET &CHECKSUM# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 2) : SET &RESULT# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 3) : IF &RESULT# <> "" : PRINT "Add file &FILE# &CHECKSUM#" : PUT_VAR_COL &UC4RB_ARTIFACT_VARA_NAME#, &FILE#, 1, &CHECKSUM# : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS
:CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
